mention.text: ikimenabanga '' -- for the person within a group who says too much
Burundi , Rwanda and eastern Congo -- the Great Lakes area of Africa
a Hutu whose administration demonized all Tutsi as supporters of rebels fighting to oust him
a position that underlay the outside world 's inaction during the 1994 genocide in Rwanda
a professor at the Universities of Antwerp and Leuven and a leading scholar of the Great Lakes region
the Universities of Antwerp and Leuven
a vision many Europeans and North Americans have
the Tutsi , who arrived on the land later as nomads and tended to raise cattle -LRB- about 15 percent -RRB- ; and the Twa
the Tutsi , who were viewed as taller , thinner , smarter -LRB- and thus more like the Europeans -RRB-
the lines between Hutu and Tutsi
the lines between Hutu and Tutsi
The Rwanda Crisis '' -LRB- Columbia University Press , 1995 -RRB-
a consultant with the Center for Conflict Resolution in Cape Town
many people have blood on their hands -- Hutu and Tutsi alike -- that their own mutually awful pasts
